title: College Sport Team Makeover
description: College Sport Team Makeover is a dress-up game that lets you dress four stylish students in a new college team makeover adventure! This game offers a variety of clothing items to create fashionable outfits for two girls and two boys who are the best athletes in high school. Whether you prefer sporty or casual styles, you can customize their looks individually or as a team. With options for skin color, hairstyles, accessories, and backgrounds, this game provides a unique opportunity to showcase your fashion sense and style skills. Dress up the whole squad and capture your creations with the "Camera" button to share with friends. Explore this rich girl and boy squad's wardrobe and enjoy hours of fashion fun!
